entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
